subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of the Chauhan Dynasty?
question_hi: छौँहाँ जनता के संतुष्टिका ने कौनों से प्रसन्न हुए।
explanation_en: Prithviraj Chauhan was the founder of the Chauhan Dynasty. He was a Rajput king who established his kingdom during the 11th century.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहीन चौहान स्तर्थ के वितरण करने वाला चौहान जी. यह 11वे दशां में राजपूर्वांचना करने वाला है।
